refnamediv.refpurpose: add a name in the table of functions

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Utility function (for experts only). Adds the name "function-name" in the table of functions known to the interpreter. "nameptr" is an integer 1000*fun+fin where fun and fin is the internal coding of the primitive "function-name". This function is useful to associate a primitive to a routine interfaced in "matusr.f" (fun=14). Used with funptr and clearfun one can redefine a primitive by a function with same name.
